author: cnbc.com
title: Vital Therapies: 1Q Earnings Snapshot
text:
SAN DIEGO (AP) _ Vital Therapies Inc. (VTL) on Tuesday reported a loss of $14.4 million in its first quarter.
The San Diego-based company said it had a loss of 34 cents per share.
Vital Therapies shares have declined slightly more than 8 percent since the beginning of the year. In the final minutes of trading on Tuesday, shares hit $5.45, a climb of 45 percent in the last 12 months.
This story was generated by Automated Insights ( http://automatedinsights.com/ap ) using data from Zacks Investment Research. Access a Zacks stock report on VTL at https://www.zacks.com/ap/VTL
